name: Philly Free Mini Cheesecakes
ingredients: 3-8 oz. pkgs. cream cheese fat free, soft
1 cups fruit or reduced calorie pie filling
instructions: Place wafers, flat side down on bottom of each of 12 paper-lined muffin cups.
Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla on medium speed until well  blended.
Add eggs; mix just until blended.
Do not over beat after adding eggs.
Pour over wafers, filling each cup.
